Description:

Action Sniper Elite 3 takes place during the Second World War. In the role of American agent Charles Fairbairn you have to go to North Africa to help the Allied forces to cope with the onslaught of the Nazis. In parallel, the hero learns of a secret program to develop tanks, realizing that Germany will be able to decide the outcome of the war. The game is notable for non-linear gameplay, unfolding in an open area. You wait for the fierce battle with melee weapons, as well as shooting from distance. Bustling cities and remote villages - your invaluable assistant in tactical planning and displacements. Updated camera gives the ability to destroy armored vehicles and tanks with just one well-aimed shot into the gas tank. Luggage X-Ray detailed manner will show you how the bullets fired from the destroyed muscle and circulatory system. Moreover, Sniper Elite 3 includes cooperative transmission mode and multiplayer.
Installation: 

1. Burn or mount the image.
2. Install the game.
3. Copy over the cracked content from the /Crack directory on the image to your game install directory.
4. Play the game.
5. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT!
